main event: On February 28, 1959, students observed a round, disc-shaped object that appeared silver in color.
interesting points: The object was reported to be the size of a pinhead at a distance,The object broke into four smaller objects during the observation,The observation lasted for approximately 5 minutes,Students used binoculars to observe the object,The incident was reported to the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book for further investigation.
